bot_token: Put your Discord bot token here

map_image: Put your server map image link here
rules:
No alt guilds: 
  - No Fobs 
  - All characters must be in the same guild

Griefing: 
  - No Mine spamming  
  - No Greifing in any way you as a player can think of.

No glitching 
  - inside houses 
  - glitching arrows through walls 
  - Perry Glitching 
  - Unknown Glitching to the network
No building on mountains, no terraforming rivers

Do Not Cry to Admin Every 5 mins 
  - suck it up if you get your ass kicked 
  - Only genuine concerns **PLEASE**

Siege 
  - Inside or outside of JH is fair game 
  - Tables Only to gain access 
  - The first table must have 4 legs touching the ground 
  - stacking tables on other objects to make a scaffold is unacceptable!

No third-party software: 
  - NO Uengine, 
  - No Bandit Mod 
  - No other Random Cheating program Unknown to Vikings Network  
  - If you are caught **You will be Banned!**
